casebody.data:
The State Of Ohio, Appellee, v. Holloway, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Holloway, 129 Ohio St.3d 341, 2011-Ohio-4037.]

(No. 2010-2229 Submitted August 8, 2011 Decided August 16, 2011.) Joseph T. Deters, Hamilton County Prosecuting Attorney, and Nicholas Klingensmith, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Shelia Kyle-Reno, Hamilton County Public Defender, and Robert R. Hastings Jr., Assistant Public Defender, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Mbodji 129 Ohio St.3d 325, 2011-Ohio-2880, 951 N.E.2d 1025.

O’Connor, C.J., and Lundberg Stratton, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur. Pfeifer and O’Donnell, JJ., dissent.
